entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is introduced as a character who is swiftly responding to someone. She is described as shoving Harry forward and menacingly warning the conductor.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character, being shoved forward by Tonks and having his name shouted out by the conductor.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as one of the people being shoved forward by Tonks.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people being shoved forward by Tonks.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as a character who joins Harry on board and looks around happily.

entities.name: knight bus
entities.description: The Knight Bus is described as a vehicle that has three decks and is crammed with mismatched chairs.

entities.name: conductor
entities.description: The conductor is introduced as someone who goggles at Harry as he passes.

relationships.description: Tonks shoves Harry forward toward the steps.
The conductor recognizes Harry and shouts his name.
